Title: Jackie Bradley Jr. Rumors: Brewers Pursuing Free Agent Amid Red Sox, Mets Links
Description: The Milwaukee Brewers are "in the mix" for free-agent outfielder Jackie Bradley Jr., per Robert Murray of FanSided. Bradley, a homegrown star for the Boston Red Sox who has spent all eight years of his career with the team that drafted him in the first round out of South Carolina in 2011,
Author: Bleacher Report
